issue.title: [C++] Default display for multi-choice define_option_string is misleading
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8419](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8419). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
While working on ARROW-8410, I noticed:

```Java

--   ARROW_SIMD_LEVEL=AVX2 [default=NONE|SSE4_2|AVX2|AVX512]
--       SIMD compiler optimization level
--   ARROW_ARMV8_ARCH=armv8-a+crc+crypto [default=armv8-a|armv8-a+crc+crypto]
--       Arm64 arch and extensions
```
